column1: Super bummed that I received this perfect little travel size and it had gone bad.  Smelled the way oil smells when it's turned.  $45 only to throw it away immediately.  URGH!
Received perfume but bottle was 1/2 empty.  Was not new as described.
Does not smell like department stores product and certainly does not last like department stores.
Love the price
For some reason I didn't realize how small the bottle was - I should have known - shame on me...
Poor quality fragrance.
I was curious about this perfume and decided to get a small size to try it.  I'm very, very pleased with it.  Will order it again, but a much larger size.
Old old perfume. I could tell this bottle was old as sh*t. It stank. Waste of $
NICE
Too expensive for a tiny bottle
Smells so good! Bought because perfect travel size for vacation!

The two bottles that I ordered I was aware were very tiny bottles because I read the reviews before purchasing them.  The price was very reasonable but the fragrance doesn't last very long on me.  This worked out good for me because it gives me a chance to try Estee Lauder's "Pleasures" fragrance before I purchase a full size bottle which is expensive.
I don't wear perfume a lot so the small bottle is perfect for me. This way I don't feel like I'm wasting my money or that a huge bottle of perfume will go bad.
This was the ideal "stocking stuffer" for my daughter.  She loves  Estee Lauder, and the size is great for carrying in her purse or when she's traveling.
This is one of my favorite fragrances. Just next time I will be purchasing a larger bottle.
Love that it's small I can carry it in my makeup bag. It smells great!!
Great stocking stuffers
Love the scent.  Small bottle will last awhile with me so the nominal cost works for me.  Why pay big bucks for a large bottle that sits for years?
small, is like a sample, good smell.
Scent was as expected, bottle much smaller than expected, more to the bottle structure than ounces of perfume.
Very satisfied with product & price, although better if shipped within a small box rather than paper wrap.
I thought the bottle was small for the price.  However, perfume is very expensive today.  The bottle smelled great as pleaures would.
It was super old or fake.

Pleasures has always been a favorite & when I saw the price I had to purchase.  Even though, I'm all out of this product, I would recommend to those who like to have a nice fresh scent that will stay with them all day.
I bought this perfume for my mother in law. She loves the scent but really wanted one for her purse. This was perfect!

Estee Lauder's Pleasures perfume has become my favorite! I needed these small travel size spray type for our many travels and the stores don't often have the travel size. As usual, if I can't find what I'm looking for in stores, I can find it on Amazon. So thank you, Estee Lauder, for a light, wondeful aroma perfume and to Amazon for carrying the travel size.
Shipping was very quick.  Love to have this size for my purse.  Love this perfume
This is my signature scent... I love these little bottles and put one in my purse and one in my travel bag.  Love, love, love
Love the trial size!! ❤️
loove it
This arrived a day early and smells nice. I keep it in my purse for random occasions or when I need to smell happy smells :)
I am allergic. It is too strong smell for me. My nose ran when i smell it. It  might fit other people who are not allergic.

I have worn Pleasures for almost 20 years. So i wanted a small one to take on vacation with me, hence why i ordered this small sized one. When it arrived, it was a yellowish color. Which is NOT the color of Pleasures. Also, it did not smell like Pleasures. Very dissapointed.
Nice light pleasant fragance perfect for summer. Its a great value. Going back to buy mini set of all Pleasure fragance
I am very pleased with my purchase and the ease of the transaction. This item arrived in great condition and is exactly as advertised.Thank you very much.
This was delivered quickly and was just what we wanted.
I have loved "Estee Lauder" since their "Youth Dew" won my late husband's love in 1965. I use other brands sometimes but this one will always be special -  thank you so much.
I love this, is perfect for my purse, love the smell
Perfect for travel. I like the soft fragrance
I have always loved Estee Lauder Pleasures perfume. This particular purchase makes it very convenient for me to carry it when I travel.
My favorite scent and this bottle was a great size to fit in my purse!
Perfect for my purse
Smells fresh and clean just as I remember from years ago.  Really nice scent...not too sweet
Going on a cruise and this is perfect to have along.
Pleasures is my favorite perfume. It's not overpowering, as so many perfumes are, has a sweet, delicate floral scent and is not offensive to the nose.
Bought it for my grandmother ad she loved it! Great little size and smells as good as it should.
Have lived this fragrance since it came out. Lovely.
Really good deal, love it!

i love this little compact bottle for my purse, I've ordered this twice and will continue to do so, they are sooo cute and smell good too, I thought when I first saw this tiny cute bottle it may not smell as good as my regular sized bottle but it does, love these for life
Purchased for airline travel.  Already love the scent.  Why do other perfumes not come in this great travel size I wonder?
Been using this scent for over 15 years...awesome, sexy scent.
My fav perfume glad to find. It in small size for travel
Love the smell, wish it was bigger
Perfume was old and it changed scent after about a week
Delicious fragrance.  Sweet little bottle for my purse.
My wife's favorite perfume and much cheaper here than at the department stores.
Smells fantastic. Would recommend!
Wonderful summer fragrance!
love it, classic Estee Lauder
love
as advertised good seller
So in love with this sent I have used it for years and i still love it.
Bottle seemed a bit used, but arrived very fast
Very small but great scent.
Luv it smell last 4 hours
great for travel
I gave this as a gift to a friend to see if she would like it - she does.  Good to know with Christmas not too far away.
love it!!
Love it! Loved the price and perfect amount of perfume. Perfect to carry in my purse too! And did not take long to get in the mail!
Quick delivery.love it
Speaks for itself. Great smell
Great product
This was just what I wanted for a gift. No problems at all.
Nice fragrance!
This lovely scent was shipped promptly and priced right.  Yes, it is small, but if you read the description, you will know what you're getting.  I was very pleased with this product!
to small for the price
I love this smell from the collection of classic parfumes by Estee.I think, I'll buy a bigger bottle, but this one is perfect for carrying in purse.
Came in excellent condition just as described
Great acent
smelles great
My husband likes it!  Nice sexy scent, not over powering...
very nice!
My favorite perfume in a travel size. Perfect for my purse.
My mom loves it
great smell
gift
Good tester, smells really clean, will buylarger bottle.
This stuff is my all time favorite, I would Never stat my day with out this . Love the smell very plesen !!
gift
I personally didn't like the way it smelled and it didn't last at all once I sprayed it but it came on time.
Perfect for traveling
Smells Wonderful!
This softly floral scent is perfect for both daytime and evening wear.  I use it almost daily and I wore it for my son's wedding this past weekend.  Perfect!
Delivered quickly, great size for travel or purse. Wish I'd thought to buy it long ago.
This old fragrance brings back memories, it smells exactly how I remembered it, nice floral scent that lasts, not stale.
Excellent. I loved the product.  Exquisite
Definitely a MINI!! the sprayer doesn't work properly so when I go to put some on the fragrance gets all over my hands and no where else. Wouldn't recommend it.
Excellent fragrance, the price is good, my wife love it, the size is perfect for purse or small hand bag.
Price was great. I often like to refresh my scent, and this is a great purse size refresher.  I was surprised at the speedy delivery
Came exactly when stated and was exactly as advertised.
I t was  a birthday  gift for my special daughter on Sunday , by  wed. it was gone. She loved it. I ordered two and will save the second for Christmas.
I love the fresh scent of this Parfum.
No problems!
Perfect size great size
The recipient of this perfume spray as gift was very happy with it and loves it!  I am therefore very satisfied with my purchase!
wife loves it
great
Just what I expected and they arrived on time. All good. Great value. Perfect for taking with me in my purse.
I love Estee Lauder's Beautiful and have always wanted to try Pleasures,so glad I got to try it cheaper.I love the smell.
It is too little.
It is nice
I thought it would be a little more in the bottle they were not filled all the way, which was disappointing after the bottle is already small as it is
Purchased as a travel gift with the travel lotion and full size perfume will fit into almost any bag or purse.
Nice to have small parfum to carry in the purse
Very convenient for a purse
quick delivery and smells great!
Love this scent
Smells great. Not too strong.
I have 2.5ml bottle and purchase this one just to have it always with me just in case and/or for traveling.
It smelled ok but it just didn't suit me personally if
Pleasureable
Perfect for carry on luggage!!
Estee Lauder customer since 1966. Thanksomuch
This was an excellent buy.  The size is great to slip into my bag, and the fragrance is very feminine!

I have been searching for this travel size cologne. I received one of these years ago as part of a free gift promotion and was so happy with the size. It is perfect to fit in your 1 quart zip lock bag. I have been doing carry on for years now and have made an effort to find the perfect travel size items that will all fit into the required bag. It should last through my month long trip to Europe. The spray glass bottle measures 3" h x 3/4" w.

I use Pleasures about 15 years, I know the real smell of this perfume. When I ordered it on Amazon, I made a risk with buying a product without smelling it. Now I see it is real smell. So I will buy a perfume only from this seller.

When I got the second bottle of perfume it smelled wonderful just like my only smell!! Thank you so much I truly did not think that you would send me another bottle and a hand written note from the person that prepared it for shipment that they had opened the bottle and smelled it and it smelled good to them!! I do not know another company that would do that! I loved that! I will soon be needing another bottle and cannot afford to buy a large bottle my Pleasures! Thank you again!  DeAnna

I bought this because it is one of my favorite scents and I wanted a travel size. Unfortunately it stopped spraying after I used it twice. So I now have a nearly full travel size that doesn't spray. Very disappointed.
she likes small ones... my wife does,.. thats why she married me
There was no scent to this perfume....made me think it was bottled water, except bottled water smells better than the bottle of Pleasures,
I didn't realize how VERY SMALL this bottle would be.
NOTHING TO SAY BUT THIS IS SO SMALL

Love the small size. Easy traveler. Price allows you to try for a while to see if you really like the fragrance. I don't care for heavy fragrances and this was very nice. Would order again and recommend.
its very nice but deeply disappointing for the money. If you're gonna buy it, go all out and not get this one.
ok
I carry this in my handbag. Then I also get a large bottle of same for home. Thanks P. Ar.
Love this perfume!!!! Arrived quickly!
Too little
This product is not Estee Lauder Pleasures.  I am very familiar with the fragrance; I have been using it since it became available many years ago.It was delivered promptly, however.

I'm not one to wear just one scent. I purchased this from Amazon as part of an Estee Lauder gift set. I adore the fragrance! It's light and floral; in a word, exquisite. The color is clear, as it should be. I am sure Pleasures can be used for any occasion, but I prefer to use it in the daytime for work, tennis, walking, going out to lunch, shopping with my friends, visiting the in-laws and more.
I love it! It is one of the few perfumes that does not "go bad" in your body after wearing it for 8 hours in a warm weather
A classic scent.  Fun, but also elegant.  Anything Estee is a winner.
same as the top on is not a .14 oz but it did got here on time
Its my favorite fragrance.
Perfect for carry on luggage!!
My wife love the Parfum....
stinky stuff
